entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, described as not answering at once and pretending to read a book.

entities.name: asiatic anti-venoms
entities.description: A book that Harry is pretending to read, mentioned in the text as 'a page of Asiatic Anti-Venoms'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, described as proposing an idea on a previous night.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned in the text as looking up at Ron and seeming keener to join in the conversation.

relationships.description: Harry is pretending to read a page of Asiatic Anti-Venoms.
Hermione proposed an idea on a previous night, which Harry has been thinking about.
Harry looked up at Ron during the conversation.
Ron seemed keener to join in the conversation now that he was sure Harry had thought about it.
Harry has been thinking about an idea, which Hermione proposed.
